email_chain.subject: Rate Inquiry - Steel Coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

We are looking to ship 10,000 MT of steel coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles. Could you provide a rate estimate for this shipment? We are considering FOB terms and would like to know the laycan and vessel options available.

Best regards,
Laura Martinez
Cargo Transport Inc.

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Steel Coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel MV OCEAN TRADER, DWT 75,000, LOA 200m, with a laycan of April 10-15. The starting freight rate is $65/MT FOB Shanghai. Please let us know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Peter Wilson
Maritime Brokers Ltd.

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Steel Coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

Thank you for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the rate seems a bit high. We are seeing offers closer to $60/MT. Could you adjust the rate accordingly?

Best regards,
Laura

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Steel Coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

We can adjust the rate to $62/MT, considering the volume and our long-standing relationship. Please confirm if this is acceptable so we can proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Peter

email_chain.subject: Re: Rate Inquiry - Steel Coils from Shanghai to Los Angeles
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

$62/MT is acceptable. Please proceed with the booking and send us the contract details. We will arrange for the cargo to be ready by the laycan dates.

Best regards,
Laura
